name: iCaganer
description:
:::::: ENJOY WITH THE AUGMENTED REALITY CAGANER ::::::

This augmented reality app lets you see Caganer like you've never seen before.

Open the app, point the cover of a magazine or book as perpendicular as possible and let iCaganer run over the table.

You can put your face on the character and send Christmas greetings.

Surprise family and friends with iCaganer, the Caganer in augmented reality!
